oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: John Haywood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Painted profile portrait of John Haywood (1762-1826). He has on glasses, a dark coat, and ruffled neckwear.

Known as "the father of Tennessee history." North Carolina state attorney general, 1792-95; associate justice of North Carolina state supreme court, 1794; justice of Tennessee state supreme court, 1816. Founder of Tennesee Antiquarian Society.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Haywood, John, 1762-1826
